General.Name: Shin Ruenn Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD develops, trades in, leases, and sells residential and other real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Jinglay, Inc. and changed its name to Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD. in July 2011. Shin Ruenn development Co., LTD was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 109, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 105
